Reviews.Title: not quite as advertised
Reviews.Author: derek jones
Reviews.Content: It was suitable but the ad doesn't say that its a rebuilt from spare parts phone. It has several parts of other phones

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY
Reviews.Author: Alexus Pratchett
Reviews.Content: this phone sucks !!!!!!! head phones dont work . the screen feels fake . cant connect to wifi. its HORRIBLE

Reviews.Title: dont not buy
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this phone it is junk an it dont work it does not let you on the internet an the screen does not work at all so fake

Reviews.Title: AT@T Phone
Reviews.Author: Evelyn Norwood
Reviews.Content: it a okay phone but my bluetooth dont work with it, but i feel it what u want to try out.

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: sonja hashaway
Reviews.Content: the phone was not what I expected  I can not check my voice mail from the phone and the volume is not loud at all

Reviews.Title: I don't like it
Reviews.Author: Jasmine brown
Reviews.Content: It's says its a galaxy 4s but it horrible... If your in a pinch and need a new phone it's ok until you can get what you want

Reviews.Title: worst phone ever
Reviews.Author: jerome raye
Reviews.Content: I WILL NEVER ORDER ANOTHER PHONE FROM THIS COMPANY, WHY ?1. The phone feels and looks like a toy2.the screen is not made of glass but of plastic3. you cant connect to wifi4.it comes with headphones, but guess what! THEY DONT WORK!!!!if yu have a 2 or 3 year old child it wud be the perfect toy., but for a good phone i WOULD NOT BUY THIS ONE

ProductInfo.Features:
Operation Frequency:GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHZ, automatically frequency switching(This Cell Phone only works with GSM networks, NOT 3G Networks)
Note: This phone will only work with GSM 2G network 850/900/1800/1900MHz, please check if your local?
DualSIMdual standby:supports 2 SIM 2 standby simultaneously
Multi-Language: English, Arabic, Persian, French, Turkish, Portuguese, Spanish, Russian, polish, Thai, Vietnamese, Malaysian, Indonesian, Italian, Hungarian, Burmese
Systerm :MTK (its not a smart phone)
